data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 SE 8.1
data.actual_result: Lags, could vary depending on device, my device is rooted and executing top shows me that Discord jumps from 7% to 42% CPU load upon entering changelogs
data.short_description: Changelog is laggy (much more noticable on low-end devices)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to settings - Go to changelog - Notice how the video is laggy - Scroll the Change Log
